icp.what_they_sell: Build-to-print contract manufacturing of metal and plastic parts, including metal stampings, forgings, castings, fasteners, machining, extrusions, and plastic injection molding.
icp.customer_industry: Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) across various industries including hardware, railroad, agriculture, military, mining, hand tools, automotive, trucking, medical, musical instruments, and consumer products.
icp.customer_company_size: Ranges from startups to large global OEMs.
ideal_customer_characteristics: Requires high-volume production of metal or plastic parts.
Seeks cost savings through offshore manufacturing.
Needs a reliable and vertically integrated manufacturing partner.
Requires ISO/TS16949 or ISO9001 certified manufacturing.
Outsources manufacturing to reduce capital expenditure.

serviceable_geography.notes: Production facilities are located in China, India, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia and Philippines. Sales and support presence in the United States.
